author: gakonst
content: Hi this isn't the right channel as it relates more to execution layer ethereum client development! Please check one of the other channels.

author: pipermerriam
content:
Reminder for execution teams who want to move 4444s forward...

1. Is this a priority for your team? Yes üëç  /No üëç 
2. If yes, who on your team is going to take on the engineering work.
3. Take a look at our specs so that we can have an informed discussion

specs: https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/blob/master/history-network.md

rough sketch of our suggested plan for delivery of 4444s by end of this year: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1052#issuecomment-2136877600
